title: src/pkg/time/time.go: time.Unix doesn't use Second constant
body:
https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/pkg/time/time.go#970

The use of 1e9 for dividing nanoseconds into seconds should probably be done using the
Second constant already defined in the file
(https://code.google.com/p/go/source/browse/src/pkg/time/time.go#454).
